{{dcl|num=1|1=
scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp; operator=( const scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|1=
scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp; operator=( scoped_allocator_adaptor&amp;&amp; other ) = default;
}}
{{dcl end}}

@1@ Explicitly defaulted copy assignment operator that copy assigns the base class ({{tt|OuterAlloc}}, the outer allocator) and all inner allocators.

@2@ Explicitly defaulted move assignment operator that move assigns the base class ({{tt|OuterAlloc}}, the outer allocator) and all inner allocators.
